verses.text: \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* thou \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3739"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* become \w sound|strong="G5198"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w*:

\w That|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w aged|strong="G4246"\w* \w men|strong="G4586"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* sober, chaste, \w prudent|strong="G4998"\w*, \w sound|strong="G5198"\w* \w in|strong="G4102"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w in|strong="G4102"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*, \w in|strong="G4102"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w*.

\w The|strong="G1722"\w* aged \w women|strong="G4247"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* like \w manner|strong="G5615"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* holy attire, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* false accusers, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* given \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w*, \w teaching|strong="G2567"\w* well:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G1510"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* teach \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w young|strong="G3501"\w* women \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* wise, \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w love|strong="G5362"\w* \w their|strong="G5362"\w* \w husbands|strong="G5362"\w*, \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w love|strong="G5362"\w* \w their|strong="G5362"\w* \w children|strong="G5388"\w*,

\w To|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G2316"\w* discreet, \w chaste|strong="G0053"\w*, sober, having \w a|strong="G2316"\w* care \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* house, gentle, \w obedient|strong="G5293"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w their|strong="G2398"\w* \w husbands|strong="G0435"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G2316"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w blasphemed|strong="G0987"\w*.
\w Young|strong="G3501"\w* men, \w in|strong="G3588"\w* like \w manner|strong="G5615"\w*, \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w* \w that|strong="G3870"\w* they be sober.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* shew thyself an example \w of|strong="G2041"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* integrity, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* gravity,

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w sound|strong="G5199"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w can|strong="G3004"\w* \w not|strong="G3367"\w* \w be|strong="G2192"\w* blamed: \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w he|strong="G3004"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w contrary|strong="G1727"\w* \w part|strong="G1473"\w*, \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G2192"\w* afraid, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w evil|strong="G5337"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w*.

Exhort \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w obedient|strong="G5293"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G3956"\w* \w masters|strong="G1203"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w pleasing|strong="G2101"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* gainsaying:

\w Not|strong="G3361"\w* defrauding, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* shewing \w good|strong="G0018"\w* fidelity, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G1722"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w adorn|strong="G2885"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* Saviour \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* Saviour hath \w appeared|strong="G2014"\w* \w to|strong="G0444"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*;

\w Instructing|strong="G3811"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w*, \w denying|strong="G0720"\w* \w ungodliness|strong="G0763"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worldly|strong="G2886"\w* \w desires|strong="G1939"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w should|strong="G2443"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w* soberly, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w justly|strong="G1346"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w godly|strong="G2153"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w*,

\w Looking|strong="G4327"\w* \w for|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* coming \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* Saviour \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*,

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G1325"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w redeem|strong="G3084"\w* \w us|strong="G1325"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* iniquity, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w cleanse|strong="G2511"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w a|strong="G1325"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* acceptable, \w a|strong="G1325"\w* pursuer \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w rebuke|strong="G1651"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w authority|strong="G2003"\w*. \w Let|strong="G4065"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* despise thee.
